name: PixNite - Color by number
description:
PixNite Color by number is a free anti-stress coloring by number where you can find images that suit your taste.

Our coloring is very simple and will appeal to both children and adults, especially like avid fans of online games who miss the old days when they could have fun with friends, in the application they can plunge into the very atmosphere in which they were played a favorite game, only now painting over images from favorite games with a pleasant nostalgia.

The main features of the application

🔵 Set your favorite images as wallpaper on your desktop, for this you need to paint over the picture of interest to you, after which this function will appear.
🔵 Quick color pixel art mode, click quickly twice in the cell to fill the entire color completely! With this feature, you can save your own time several times, relax and unwind.
🔵Share images with friends or social networks at any stage of drawing.
🔵Ability to save your work created pixel art!
🔵 Tips when searching for non-shaded pixels, if you need to find pixels of a particular color, select it in the palette and the pixels of that color will be tinted.
🔵 Protection from incorrectly filled pixels, if you fill a pixel with a color that does not belong to it, then the box will be tinted red, and the digit will not disappear and will be visible. After that, you can click again to cancel it, or immediately paint over the pixel with the correct color.
🔵 I liked to paint very much, but have you already painted your favorite image? Do not worry, click on the button to repaint, to again experience the joy of coloring by number.
🔵 The app develops imagination, memory and fine motor skills!
🔵 New images every day, you do not have time to get bored!
🔵 Forget about irritability and bustle, thanks to a well-developed system of painting you do not need to spend a lot of time to finish the work. Average time painting over 3 minutes.
🔵 The app takes up little space on your device.
🔵 Offline coloring. To access new images, the application requires access to the Internet, but after the first launch and download of images, you can launch the application and let it paint without the Internet!
🔵 Leave your works uncoloured and return to them at any time, without worrying about the loss of progress, the images are saved and transferred to the “Works” section.
🔵 Too easy? Thanks to the advanced settings, you can disable double tap and pixel search, thereby increasing the complexity of the game.
🔵 The application contains many images from the Battle Royale, namely dances, emotions, weapons, graffiti, items from the Battle Pass of all seasons and not only.
